attributes.action: make MP's/Councillors/ accountable when they fail to deliver their campaign manifesto promises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
with the rising disinterest of the electorate both young and old due to the fact of the continious and blatant lies of some polititians, people we place  our trust in to represent US.
Those who promise the earth and deliver little  should be held accountable for failing to deliver the very things that they put forward to the electorate in their bid to gain office after all isnt it fraud to take money under false pretences,lets get people more interested in politics by making those responsible accountable for thier inabillity to deliver.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
